galaxy.summary: Galaxy wrapper for the Bioconductor mzR package, enabling conversion between common mass spectrometry data formats (mzML, mzXML, netCDF) within Galaxy workflows.
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: Provides a unified API to the common file formats and parsers available for mass spectrometry data. It comes with a wrapper for the ISB random access parser for mass spectrometry mzXML, mzData and mzML files. The package contains the original code written by the ISB, and a subset of the proteowizard library for mzML and mzIdentML. The netCDF reading code has previously been used in XCMS.
